DecreeSetup.questDescriptionRules.rulesS.li: decreeIntro->[asker_nameDef], your [asker_bestRoyalTitle], has issued a royal decree.

decreeThreatInfo->If you fail to fulfill this decree within [decreeDays] days, [asker_nameDef] will start to become unhappy. [asker_possessive] anger will increase over time until the decree is satisfied.

LanguageData.DecreeSetup.LetterTextDecreeCancelled.sl: [asker_nameDef] has grudgingly cancelled the decree '[resolvedQuestName]' since it cannot be completed.
